prefix.name: description
prefix.item: Directory within Cyklotron working directory where sitemap files will be generated. Generation is disabled when not set.
GZIP compression of the ouptpu files.

prefix.name: documents
prefix.item: Patterns for generating URLs of documents in specific sites. Example: wiadomosci.ngo.pl=/wiadomosci/{id}.html When not set, pattern /x/{id} is used.
